instructions.1: PREHEAT broiler. Line baking sheet with foil.
instructions.2: COMBINE nectar, cornstarch and nutmeg in a small saucepan; stir until cornstarch is dissolved. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently for 6 to 8 minutes, or until mixture just reaches a boil. Remove from heat.
instructions.3: PLACE peach halves cut side up on prepared baking sheet; sprinkle sugar evenly over peach halves. Broil for 5 to 6 minutes or until sugar is caramelized and golden. Transfer to wire rack to cool slightly.
instructions.4: TO SERVE, place about 1/4 cup mango coulis on each serving plate. Top with one peach half, caramelized side up. Garnish with mint.

questions.question: Is broiler from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
Can we combine (Step 2) and serve (Step 4) at the same time?
